ygData.msgSnippet: ok, that s different.  what i was trying to get across is that an intrument slot alone will not fix the problem, as there would have to be something else added
ygData.messageBody:
ok, that's different. what i was trying to get across is that an intrument
slot alone will not fix the problem, as there would have to be something
else added to specify whether we want to use weapons and sing or use
instrument and play, since we are now basically holding everything in a
slot. now though, instead of having to switch from weapons to instrument,
we have to push an additional button. an improvement to be sure, and worth
suggesting, though possibly more than they want to implement.

Shada
